detail_desc: Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Long raglan sleeves, press-studs at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Long raglan sleeves, press-studs at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a jacquard-knit viscose and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit viscose and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and open pockets front and back.

Short, wide dress in jersey crêpe with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest and front pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined.

Short, wide dress in jersey crêpe with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest and front pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.

Underwired bikini top with lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Shoulder straps that can be tied at the shoulders or back of the neck and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Underwired bikini top with lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Shoulder straps that can be tied at the shoulders or back of the neck and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Twill trousers with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back, pleats at the top, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Zip fly and button, and straight legs with contrasting colour panels down the sides.

Cardigan in soft pile with glittery details, a small embroidered detail at the top and a small stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard and heart-shaped tab, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Cardigan in soft pile with glittery details, a small embroidered detail at the top and a small stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard and heart-shaped tab, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets, and flared legs.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets, and flared legs.
Imitation leather trainers with a lightly padded top edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front. Contrasting colour heel caps and mesh linings and insoles.
Imitation leather trainers with a lightly padded top edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front. Contrasting colour heel caps and mesh linings and insoles.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front, a grosgrain loop at the back, and reflective details. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Imitation leather hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Imitation leather hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Strapless swimsuit with a small frill trim at the top, padded cups that shape the bust and provide support, and narrow, detachable straps that tie at the back of the neck. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved shirt in a soft, organic cotton double weave with a round neckline and button placket.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved shirt in a soft, organic cotton double weave with a round neckline and button placket.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved shirt in a soft, organic cotton double weave with a round neckline and button placket.

Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Square, elasticated neckline with a scalloped trim, 3/4-length raglan sleeves with elastication and a scalloped trim at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem.

Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Square, elasticated neckline with a scalloped trim, 3/4-length raglan sleeves with elastication and a scalloped trim at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem.
Baby Exclusive. Skirt in a textured linen and cotton weave with an elasticated waist, patch side pockets and adjustable straps that cross and fasten with concealed buttons at the back. Lined.

Dungaree shorts in lightweight washed cotton denim with frill-trimmed straps and adjustable press-stud fastenings at the front. Heart-shaped chest pocket, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Dress in cotton chambray with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button and pockets in the side seams. Gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button. Detachable imitation suede belt and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Wide, ankle-length trousers woven in a linen blend with a high waist, tie belt, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, and side pockets.
Short shorts in a cotton weave with a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Patterned set with a top in soft jersey and shorts and a sun hat in a cotton weave. Top with short, flounced sleeves, a chest pocket and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shorts with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Lined sun hat with ties under the chin. Width of brim 4.5 cm.

Patterned set with a top in soft jersey and shorts and a sun hat in a cotton weave. Top with short, flounced sleeves, a chest pocket and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shorts with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Lined sun hat with ties under the chin. Width of brim 4.5 cm.

Shorts with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Lined sun hat with ties under the chin. Width of brim 4.5 cm.

Set with a sleeveless top and pair of puff pants in an airy cotton weave. Top with buttons at the back and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Puff pants with elastication and a frill-trim at the waist and around the hems.

Set with a sleeveless top and pair of puff pants in an airy cotton weave. Top with buttons at the back and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Puff pants with elastication and a frill-trim at the waist and around the hems.

Dress in a soft weave with buttons at the back of the neck, a frill-trimmed yoke that continues over the shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Dress in a soft weave with buttons at the back of the neck, a frill-trimmed yoke that continues over the shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a lace-embroidered yoke, a button placket, decorative gathers at the front and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Treggings in soft, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in stretch fabric, one pair in denim, and one pair in twill. Elasticated waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in stretch fabric, one pair in denim, and one pair in twill. Elasticated waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Loose-fitting, sports vest top in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Slightly longer at the back.

Straight-cut sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with a round neck and short dolman sleeves. One top has a print motif on the front.
Straight-cut sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with a round neck and short dolman sleeves. One top has a print motif on the front.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a sports top and short tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Straight-cut top with short dolman sleeves, a print motif on the front and rounded hem. Longer at the back. Tights with a panel at the waist.

Set with a sports top and short tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Straight-cut top with short dolman sleeves, a print motif on the front and rounded hem. Longer at the back. Tights with a panel at the waist.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and reflective details.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric, one patterned, both with a mesh racer back and elasticated hem. Lined at the front.
Sports vest tops in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with twisted side seams and narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Fitted, long-sleeved body in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front and press-studs at the crotch.

Short dress in lace with a skirt in a pleated weave. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with an overlocked hem. Partly lined.

Short dress in lace with a skirt in a pleated weave. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with an overlocked hem. Partly lined.

Short dress in lace with a skirt in a pleated weave. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with an overlocked hem. Partly lined.

Short dress in lace with a skirt in a pleated weave. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with an overlocked hem. Partly lined.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Ballet pumps in soft, patterned imitation leather with an elastic strap over the foot and a grosgrain trim around the top. Glittery elastic bow at the front and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in satin made from recycled polyester, and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a frill at the top, high waist, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.

Double-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Shirt in a textured cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and a chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Fitted shirt in sturdy Tencel™ lyocell and cotton twill with a stand-up collar and concealed press-studs down the front. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with a concealed press-stud, and bellowed chest pockets with a flap and D-ring fastener. Tapered waist with a rounded front. Shorter at the back.
Jumper knitted in a mohair and wool blend with long dolman sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in an airy weave with beaded embroidery in a narrow cut at the top with a small collar with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck, an opening at the back and a seam with elastication at the back of the waist. Lined.

Short dress in an airy weave with beaded embroidery in a narrow cut at the top with a small collar with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck, an opening at the back and a seam with elastication at the back of the waist. Lined.
Straight-cut top in jersey crêpe with short cap sleeves and a concealed zip at the back of the neck.
